       //HQSOFT's generated code:
       public virtual async Task<List<%%entity-name%%Dto>> GetListNoPagedAsync(Get%%entity-name-plural%%Input input)
        {
            var items = await _%%entity-name-camelcase%%Repository.GetListNoPagedAsync(input.FilterText, %%input-properties%%%%<if:HasFilterableProperties>%%, %%</if:HasFilterableProperties>%%input.Sorting);

            return ObjectMapper.Map<List<%%entity-name%%>, List<%%entity-name%%Dto>>(items);
        } 
        //</suite-custom-code-autogenerated>
